name: CKQuerySubscription
desc: A subscription that generates push notifications when CloudKit modifies records that match a predicate.

items.name: init(recordType: CKRecord.RecordType, predicate: NSPredicate, subscriptionID: CKSubscription.ID, options: CKQuerySubscription.Options)
items.desc: Creates a named query-based subscription that queries records of a specific type.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a query-based subscription from a serialized instance.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: The matching criteria to apply to records.

items.name: var querySubscriptionOptions: CKQuerySubscription.Options
items.desc: Options that define the behavior of the subscription.

items.name: struct CKQuerySubscription.Options
items.desc: Configuration options for a query subscription.

items.name: var recordType: CKRecord.RecordType?
items.desc: The type of record that the subscription queries.

items.name: var zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID?
items.desc: The ID of the record zone that the subscription queries.
